title: Machine Learning Pipeline Development and Automation
description: Design and implement machine learning pipelines for efficient data processing, model training, and deployment.

title: Retrieval-Augmented Generation with Large Language Models
description: Develop and integrate Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques with large language models to improve information retrieval and response accuracy.

title: Enterprise ELK Stack Search Engine Development
description: Build and configure an ELK (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) stack for robust and efficient search engine solutions.

title: Data Ingestion and Extraction Pipeline Engineering
description: Develop scalable data ingestion and extraction pipelines to streamline data flow from multiple sources into storage and processing systems.

title: Advanced Data Visualization Dashboards with Power BI and Python
description: Design and implement interactive dashboards using Power BI and Python visualization libraries for effective data representation and analysis.

title: Data Engineering and Cloud Infrastructure Management on GCP
description: Develop and manage data engineering solutions on Google Cloud Platform, focusing on storage, processing, and analysis.
